tasks.label: Build Java (active file folder)
tasks.command: if not exist ..\out mkdir ..\out && javac --release 21 -d ..\out *.java && java -cp ..\out Main < input.txt

tasks.label: Build and Run Java (with input.txt)
tasks.command: if not exist ..\out mkdir ..\out && javac -d ..\out *.java && java -cp ..\out Main < input.txt

tasks.label: Build and Run Java (redirect to output.txt)
tasks.command: if not exist ..\out mkdir ..\out && javac -d ..\out *.java && java -cp ..\out Main < input.txt > output.txt
